It has three rooms of different sizes with large windows. For both double and double beds. It has individual Pelef heating And air conditioning in the living room which provides heat during the cold months and is very cool in summer. The house has two large bathrooms with a shower (one on the ground floor and one on the upper floor) renovated and with a shower tray. The carpentry is made of aluminum and the doors are made of wood. The floor on the ground floor is ceramic and the floor on the upper floor is flooring. The kitchen is spacious with all types of appliances: microwave, washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, hood and vitro. It has a charming and warm interior patio. It gives light to the house. The property is ideal to move into. We would highlight that the house is located a few kilometers from Madrid, to live or enjoy a second residence and disconnect from stress. Fuentidueña de Tajo is a Spanish municipality located in the southeastern corner of the Community of Madrid, on the border with the province of Toledo.Located in the Las Vegas region, its population reaches 1,980 inhabitants (INE 2017).The municipal area is crossed by the Tagus River. The Tagus River crosses its terminus and forms a deep depression. Fuentidueña de Tajo, like the vast majority of the province of Madrid, has a continental Mediterranean climate characterized by having a dry and hot season corresponding to the summer months, a cold and dry winter and two seasons (spring and autumn) with mild temperatures. and where the rains are concentrated. Its 7 wonders stand out on a tourist level. The Tagus River for bathing in summer, the entire Vega for walking and hiking and many more rural tourist attractions. In addition, it has supermarkets, bars, schools, hardware stores, pharmacies... Conveniences to facilitate day-to-day life. description: Huspy presents this charming semi-detached house, located in the Colonia Tierno Galván de Fuentidueña de Tajo, it is presented as a cozy and functional home. With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, it offers the perfect comfort for quiet living. The property has a garage, a pantry and a cellar, providing additional space and functionality for daily needs. Built in 1985 on a 120 m² plot, the construction quality is normal, providing a warm and pleasant atmosphere. The chalet is spread over two floors, and its garden offers an outdoor space to enjoy relaxing moments. This home is the perfect combination of functionality and charm, ideal for those seeking a peaceful lifestyle in the beautiful community of Fuentidueña de Tajo.

Welcome to this charming chalet located on a bull farm in Fuentidueña de Tajo, covering a majestic 47,000 square meters. This exclusive enclave offers an authentic country life experience with a bullring, creating a unique environment steeped in bullfighting tradition and culture. The chalet has an elegant event room perfect for memorable celebrations. In addition, it offers individual apartments that combine comfort and style. Access to basic services such as water and electricity guarantee convenience amidst the surrounding natural beauty. This property is an extraordinary opportunity for investors who want to be part of a unique and exciting company. Discover the serenity and splendor of life on this bullfighting farm, where every day becomes a celebration of life and culture.

Huspy presents a captivating villa in Fuentidueña de Tajo, it is a unique opportunity to create the home of your dreams. With 165 m² built distributed over two floors, it offers a large canvas for the imagination.Although currently awaiting renovation, its 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms provide a solid foundation for a custom design. The storage room adds additional convenience, while the charming patio is a perfect space for outdoor moments. Built in 1945, this home offers an authentic connection to history, and its ordinary construction quality presents a solid foundation for renovation. Imagine the possibilities and turn this chalet into a unique expression of your style and comfort.Welcome to your next life project!

Huspy presents a magnificent 230 m2 single-family home, with 8 bedrooms and two bathrooms. It is located in the urban area next to the viewpoint of the Castillo de la Orden de Santiago that gives its name to the fortress, very close to the Bullring and the Town Hall. The building is in perfect condition and ready to move into. Fuentidueña del Tajo is a town that belongs to Madrid located in the Las Vegas Region and in the historic area of Alcarria de Chinchón. The Tagus River runs through the town, creating a magnificent riverside landscape that invites you to take long walks in the shade of its willows, poplars, ash trees and tamarisk trees. It is 62km from the center of Madrid, taking less than 40 minutes to complete the journey on the A3. Upon entering the house we find a large living room with kitchen and a bedroom that enjoys hot/cold air conditioning. On this floor we also access a second bedroom, a full bathroom and the two cave rooms that maintain a cool temperature in the summer. Through its main staircase we can go down to the basement with another living room and service room or we can go up to the two upper floors. The first floor consists of 4 bedrooms, two of them very spacious, and a full bathroom. One floor above there is a large open-plan attic that gives access to a beautiful terrace with a gazebo and built-in barbecue. Within a very short distance from the house there are all kinds of services: supermarket, bars and restaurants, Public School, banks, etc. Well connected by the M-326 and M-831 roads and by bus with lines 350 A, 350B, 350C, 352, 353 and 355.
